testcase.classname: features to test vt login functionality
testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given vt user is on customer portal login page..............................passed When vt user is enter username and password.................................passed And click on vt login button................................................passed Then user is navigated to the vt home page..................................passed

testcase.classname: features to test vt login functionality
testcase.name: Login with Invalid Credentials Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given vt user is on customer portal login page..............................passed When vt user is enter username and wrong password...........................passed And click on vt login button................................................passed Then error message "Password or e-mail address is incorrect, please try again." should throw.passed
